item.title: After shooting, Wisconsin school and church lean into Christmas message for comfort
item.description: For Christians around the world, Christmas is the joyful celebration of the birth of Jesus. The faith community at Abundant Life Christian School in Madison, Wisconsin, is leaning into the belief that God is present and hasnâ€™t abandoned them just days after a deadly shooting there.

item.title: Murder and terrorism charges brought against Iranian officer in 2022 killing of American in Iraq
Santa and Mrs. Claus use military transports to bring Christmas to an Alaska Native village
